description: Wrexham are one game from Wembley again after beating 2023 EFL Cup winners Bolton 1-0 at the Stok Racecourse Ground thanks to Andy Cannon's strike.
title: Wrexham edge past Bolton to advance to semi-final of EFL Trophy
title_page: Wrexham edge past Bolton to advance to semi-final of EFL Trophy - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
John McAtee (Bolton Wanderers) hits the right post with a left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left. Assisted by Aaron Collins.
Post
Attempt blocked. Josh Dacres-Cogley (Bolton Wanderers) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jordi Osei-Tutu.
Post
Attempt missed. Ryan Barnett (Wrexham) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Andy Cannon with a headed pass following a fast break.
